title: Lecture Ex.

facts.title: Icon
detail: For list of icons check Lecture 'Icons'

facts.title: Image
detail:
Syntax: @<path_to_image>.<extension>
## Supported extensions:
- PNG
- JPG, JPEG 
- BMP 
- GIF 
- WEBP 
- $$\frac{A}{2*B}$$
## Partially Supported Image files
- SVG [Not working very often :(]

brief:

### Supports Markdown Notation :)

detail: # Detailed description - Double tap to zoom - Markdown Support ## Code ``` { "title": "Lecture Ex." "facts": [, , ...] "brief": "Brief description text" "visual": "detail":"Longer description" } ``` ## ** ``` { "title": "Icon" "subcontent": [, , ...] "content": "@Icon.check" "detail": "Text while holding" } ``` ## ** ``` { "source": "@~/Example.png" } ``` ## Tables |Syntax |Result | |---------------------------------------|-------------------------------------| |`*italic 1*` |*italic 1* | |`_italic 2_` | _italic 2_ | |`**bold 1**` |**bold 1** | |`__bold 2__` |__bold 2__ | |`This is a ~~strikethrough~~` |This is a ~~strikethrough~~ | |`***italic bold 1***` |***italic bold 1*** | |`___italic bold 2___` |___italic bold 2___ | |`***~~italic bold strikethrough 1~~***`|***~~italic bold strikethrough 1~~***| |`~~***italic bold strikethrough 2***~~`|~~***italic bold strikethrough 2***~~| |`Test Math in Table` |($\omega = d\phi / dt$) | |`Test Math Frac in Table` |$(a=\frac{\sqrt{b}}{15})$ | ## Styling Style text as _italic_, __bold__, ~~strikethrough~~, or `inline code`. - Use bulleted lists - To better clarify - Your points ## Not Supported $\ce{CO2 + H2O->H2CO3}$ - Math ($\omega = d\phi / dt$) - Colors (some blue text)
